about_the_game:
FASTEST ONLINE BATTLES
Experience the fastest, most captivating, and intense Ludo battles ever. In this high-stakes game, a single card can be the difference between victory and defeat!

CARDS AND HEROES
Collect and unlock a diverse array of powerful cards and unique heroes. Craft your own unbeatable combination and deck.

MASTER YOUR STRATEGY
We've minimized the reliance on luck to win, placing a greater emphasis on strategy and decision-making to outsmart your opponents.

EASY TO PLAY
Our game follows classic Ludo rules, making it accessible to players of all levels, with easy-to-learn abilities and interactions.

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Immerse yourself in vibrant, cartoony graphics that bring every moment to life. Experience stunning visuals, explosive colors, and captivating animations that make your gaming adventure truly unforgettable.

FOLLOW THE STORY
Embark on an epic adventure that spans the globe! Unlock comics and join Bella, our adorable bunny, as she embarks on a quest to find her grandpa, and accidentally saves the world along the way!
Explore captivating environments, from lush jungles to icy tundra's and scorching deserts ,while unraveling an exciting storyline filled with mystery and intrigue!

CUSTOMIZATION
Collect various types of dice, avatars, skins, frames, bases, emotes and effects to personalize your experience.
Shine bright and become the king of bling, standing out from the crowd!

CLASSIC MODE
For a classic experience, play our traditional Ludo with traditional rules.

Real-time, turn based, online multiplayer board game!
Challenge your friends or players from around the world in intense 1v1 multiplayer battles. Use your heroes' special powers strategically to gain the upper hand and secure victory. Will you emerge as the ultimate Ludo Hero?

PLAY NOW!
Become a HERO!

name: Ludo: Animal Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460v2 or AMD HD7750 (1024 MB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-4320 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX680 or AMD R7 260X (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Get ready for an epic gaming experience like never before, with Ludo - Animal Heroes! Roll the dice! Blast your friends, family members and other players around the globe in fast paced unpredictable online matches!
